info.name: HideMutedServers
info.description: Hides muted servers with a context menu option to show/hide. Acts similar to Discord's Hide Muted Channels option.

changelog.title: What's New?
items: Full server folder (native not the plugin) compatibility.
Muted servers inside folders will be hidden.
Folders that had all servers muted will be completely hidden.

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: Muting a new server will hide instantly.
